code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{supabase}from'../lib/supabaseClient';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MotifLibrary=()=>{const[motifs,setMotifs]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetchMotifs();},[]);async function fetchMotifs(){const{data}=await supabase.from('motifs').select();setMotifs(data||[]);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-6",children:"Motif Library"}),motifs.map(motif=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-4 mb-4 rounded shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-semibold",children:motif.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:motif.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Use:"})," ",motif.usage]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("audio",{controls:true,className:"mt-2",src:motif.audio_url})]},motif.id))]});};export default MotifLibrary;
